name: trackonomy
description: **Trackonomy** is a comprehensive expense tracking tool designed to help users manage their personal finances. Built with **TypeScript**, **Express**, **MongoDB**, and **GraphQL**, Trackonomy allows you to easily track, share, and analyze your expenses. Whether you're managing day-to-day spending or splitting costs with others, Trackonomy makes finance management simple and insightful.
author: Aakash Bhardwaj
